title: Australia Student Visa Now World’s Most Expensive at AUD 2,000
excerpt: Starting July 2025, international students planning to study in Australia will face a steeper visa cost of AUD 2,000. This significant hike in the Subclass 500 visa fee raises questions about affordability, fairness, and Australia’s global competitiveness in higher education.

title: DAAD Germany Scholarship Applications Now Open for 2025
excerpt: DAAD has officially opened the 2025 scholarship intake for international students. This includes full funding for tuition, accommodation, and monthly stipends across top German universities.

title: Top Countries Offering Scholarships Without IELTS in 2025
excerpt: Bright Scholarship lists top 10 countries offering fully funded scholarships without IELTS requirements in 2025, including Germany, Norway, Japan, and South Korea.
